snippet.title: Headless D - dungeon crawler for iOs/Android
snippet.description:
Dungeon-crawling game for people in a hurry!
https://www.headlessd.com

Explore randomly generated dungeon, fight hordes of monsters and vicious bosses. Loot gold, magic items and heads with unique abilities. Find the perfect head for your liking!
AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1153392110
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.guzboroda.dungeon 
Features:
• Play for free without any pay walls
• Collect gold, amazing and epic loot and heads with unique abilities
• Every time play new randomly generated dungeon full of traps, monsters and loot
• Fight increasingly difficult enemies and vicious bosses
• Spend collected gold right in the dungeon and heal or gain more abilities
• Stress-free gameplay for people in a hurry
• Casual Controls with full HUD support!
• Upgrade your character and fight better
• No Internet connection required

See more: https://www.headlessd.com/
Email us for support: pavel@headlessd.com
Privacy Policy: https://www.headlessd.com/privacy-policy/
Term of Service: https://www.headlessd.com/terms-of-service/
